mapper.select: SELECT cid, course_name, course_credit, create_time FROM studentms.t_course where delete_status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentms.t_course (course_name, course_credit, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{courseName}, #{courseCredit}, now(), now())
mapper.delete: update studentms.t_course set delete_status = 0, update_time =now() WHERE cid = #{courseId}
